description:
Jahy-sama has come to help the uncle of the Boss and the Landlord at his sea shack.
The uncle`s hip going out, the sudden rain, the business drought all point to mana crystals.
While Jahy-sama wants to immediately jump into recovering them, the beach guests getting into accidents and work get in the way.
On another day, Jahy-sama is talking to Druj, but it seems every word is making Druj unhappier.
Did all of her lies and deceits get uncovered?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ドゥルジ嬢は悦ばない!
